sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Shared links provide direct, read-only access to files or folder on Box. The action creates or updates a shared link for a file or a folder on Box.

Inputs:

  • Item Type - Type of the item. Can be set to the value 'File' or 'Folder'.
  • Item ID - ID of the file or folder.
  • Shared Link Access - The level of access to be given to the created shared link. Shared links with Open access level allow anyone with the URL to access the item, while shared links with Company or Collaborators access levels can only be accessed by appropriate authenticated Box users.
  • Unshared At - The date-time on which this link will become disabled.
  • Can Download - Flag to indicate if the shared link allows download. Can only be set with access levels Open and Company.

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".
  • Shared Link URL - URL of the link created for the file or folder.
  • Download URL - URL to download the file or folder.
  • Shared Link Info - Information of the created share in JSON format.
  • Shared Link Clickable - Shared Link URL with additional tags so as to make the URL clickable, when added to Work Notes in a ServiceNow record.
  • Shared Link Object - Shared Link Object.
    • ID
    • Type
    • Name
    • Shared Link

Error Messages:

  • Invalid username or password/token.
  • Item ID of either folder or file provided in invalid.
  • The credentials associated with the Box Spoke connection does not have enough permission to perform this action.
  • File with given ID not found or associated credentials do not have permissions to access the file.
  • Folder with given ID not found or associated credentials do not have permissions to access the folder.
  • Inputs 'Can Download' & 'Password' can only be set if the input 'Shared Link Access' is set to the value Open or Company.
  • Date/Time of the input Unshared At cannot be in the past.

To use this action, the corresponding Box connection and credential must be created and associated with the Box Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Shared links provide direct, read-only access to files or folder on Box. The action creates or updates a shared link for a file or a folder on Box.

Inputs:

  • Item Type - Type of the item. Can be set to the value 'File' or 'Folder'.
  • Item ID - ID of the file or folder.
  • Shared Link Access - The level of access to be given to the created shared link. Shared links with Open access level allow anyone with the URL to access the item, while shared links with Company or Collaborators access levels can only be accessed by appropriate authenticated Box users.
  • Unshared At - The date-time on which this link will become disabled.
  • Can Download - Flag to indicate if the shared link allows download. Can only be set with access levels Open and Company.

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".
  • Shared Link URL - URL of the link created for the file or folder.
  • Download URL - URL to download the file or folder.
  • Shared Link Info - Information of the created share in JSON format.
  • Shared Link Clickable - Shared Link URL with additional tags so as to make the URL clickable, when added to Work Notes in a ServiceNow record.
  • Shared Link Object - Shared Link Object.
    • ID
    • Type
    • Name
    • Shared Link

Error Messages:

  • Invalid username or password/token.
  • Item ID of either folder or file provided in invalid.
  • The credentials associated with the Box Spoke connection does not have enough permission to perform this action.
  • File with given ID not found or associated credentials do not have permissions to access the file.
  • Folder with given ID not found or associated credentials do not have permissions to access the folder.
  • Inputs 'Can Download' & 'Password' can only be set if the input 'Shared Link Access' is set to the value Open or Company.
  • Date/Time of the input Unshared At cannot be in the past.

To use this action, the corresponding Box connection and credential must be created and associated with the Box Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
